name: Sadlands
storyline:
A great sadness plague has befallen the people of the Sadlands.
Save them by encouraging them with positivity! Help yourself and others by practicing positive reinforcement and watch the positivity spread throughout the fauna and flora of the Sadlands.

Be on the lookout though, there are beings feeding on the sadness, they will try to prevent you from reaching your goal. Arm yourself in the shop and face them head on!
summary: Sadlands is a typing game centered around positivity, positive reinforcement and keeping those skilled fingies nice and toasty.
